faces.stripped_text: Whenever the Corp spends click to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn. 2 credits: For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you access cards from HQ or R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.
faces.text:
Whenever the Corp spends [click] to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.
2[credit]: For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you access cards from HQ or R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.

stripped_text: Whenever the Corp spends click to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.

title: Surveillance Network Key
